DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate tear film evaporation symptomatic soft contact lens wearer absence contact lens wear least 8 hour contact lens wear .
DOC.brief_title: DAILIES TOTAL1Â® - Comparative Assessment Tear Film Evaporation
DOC.detailed_description: This study consist 5 visit ( 1 screening , 4 assessment ) maximum 6 day assessment visit least 24 hour lens wear day prior visit . Each subject randomize wear 3 different study lens least 8 hour one 8 hour day lens wear specific sequence . This study conduct Australia .
DOC.criteria: Sign inform consent document ; Adapted , current soft contact lens wearer ; Symptoms contact lens discomfort define Symptomatology ( Eligibility ) Questionnaire ; Can successfully fit study lens ; Willing wear lens minimum 8 hour prior study visit ; Willing discontinue artificial tear rewetting drops usage day study visit ; Other protocolspecified inclusion criterion may apply . Ocular anterior segment infection , inflammation , abnormality , active disease would contraindicate contact lens wear ; Use systemic ocular medication contact lens wear could contraindicate determined investigator ; Monocular ( 1 eye functional vision ) fit one lens ; History herpetic keratitis , ocular surgery , irregular cornea ; Known pregnancy lactation ; Other protocolspecified exclusion criterion may apply .
